goal.ch: “study of earthquakes as well as of velocity structure, attenuation, and the properties of earth materials that affect the passage of seismic waves at volcanoes.“
goal.en: “study of earthquakes as well as of velocity structure, attenuation, and the properties of earth materials that affect the passage of seismic waves at volcanoes.“

outline.ch:
1)Introduction to Volcano Seismology
2)Determining magnitude scales
3)Velocity estimation and methods
4)Tatun Volcanic group previous studies
5)Tatun volcanic group latest developments
6)Role of Volcano Topography
7)Quantifying path effects based on a case study
8)Seismic Tomography of magmatic systems
9)Volcanic tremor
10)Seismic triggering of Volcanic eruptions
11)Forecasting eruptions
12)Seismic hazard of volcanic eruptions
13)Pinatubo as a case study
14)Torfajokull as a case study
outline.en:
1)Introduction to Volcano Seismology
2)Determining magnitude scales
3)Velocity estimation and methods
4)Tatun Volcanic group previous studies
5)Tatun volcanic group latest developments
6)Role of Volcano Topography
7)Quantifying path effects based on a case study
8)Seismic Tomography of magmatic systems
9)Volcanic tremor
10)Seismic triggering of Volcanic eruptions
11)Forecasting eruptions
12)Seismic hazard of volcanic eruptions
13)Pinatubo as a case study
14)Torfajokull as a case study

gradMethod.ch: 期中考50％，期末考50％，有隨堂小考

stus.department: 地球科學學系地球物理碩士班
